author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JULIETTE COULD BECOME A HURRICANE ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...JULIETTE COULD BECOME A HURRICANE ON TUESDAY... As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Aug 25 the center of Juliette was located near 17.8, -115.5 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...JULIETTE COULD BECOME A HURRICANE ON TUESDAY... As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Aug 25 the center of Juliette was located near 17.8, -115.5 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Juliette (EP5/EP102025)
